title: Sustainable fermentable sugar production using a glass fiber supported gallium–molybdenum photocatalyst towards bioethanol production: LCA analysis
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2613-2626
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00226A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rajat Chakraborty, Sourav Barman, Aritro Sarkar
A waste printed circuit board derived glass fiber supported gallium–molybdenum photocatalyst for sustainable hydrolysis of sugarcane bagasse for bioethanol production is reported.
